attributes.action: A COUNCIL FOR THE ELDERLY INCLUDING THOSE IN CARE
attributes.additional_details: All the Good ones bundled away,sometimes for a sinister Property boom,These people had the knowledge to keep Communities thriving and even thousands of years of it to the present day.Its not the same in some towns any more.The fast food generation,and fast everything.I want a Union for the Elderly where ever to be a part of the City Councils with age comes grace and wisdom.Even if they send representation from the Councils and Parties to care Homes or where ever they are.Not one good Soul should be wasted on this Earth.Thank You Daniel Williams.
